name: Twisty Dive!
description:
Ready for an adventure? Yeah? Buckle your seatbelts then!

* Jump down the colorful tunnel and crush whatever tries to stop you!
* Don’t stop, break through the pieces!
* Bounce on pieces to catch a breath!
* Avoid pieces because they can break your ball.
* Rotate blocks to clear the way for your jumping ball!

Quickly learn the easy one-tap gameplay and conquer the world of colorful tunnels with rich visual effects!
